entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h near noon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Becoming clear overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
